name: Cosmic Collector
description:
Build a space station by adding new components.  Don't let your space station get hit though. Each piece has airlocks that will only connect if they get close enough. You'll need to back up and retry if the airlock doesn't connect!  WASD to move, and Q and E to rotate the pieces.

Artist's Page: https://cassartsstudio.carrd.co/

Designer's twitch: https://m.twitch.tv/spikedevelops/profile
